backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister managing users, sellers, and listings with access control and profile creation functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module exposing a no‑op run function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays the logo and animated mascot images.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Reusable empty state component with icon, text, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Simple loading indicator with spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, navigation, background pattern, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/listings/Categor: Category filter button group for selecting listing categories.
frontend/src/components/listings/ImageUp: Allows users to upload up to three images, converting files to data URLs and supporting removal of selected images.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a listing preview with image, title, price, and quantity, and triggers navigation on click.
Form for creating or editing listings with preset autofill, image uploads, validation, and submit handling.
Renders a responsive grid of listings, handling loading and empty states and navigating to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/listings/listing: Defines predefined listing templates with titles, descriptions, prices, and quantities.
frontend/src/components/sellers/SellerDi: Fetches and displays a seller’s display name, falling back to a default if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateLi: Mutation hook that creates a new listing and invalidates related listing and seller queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateSe: Mutation hook to create a seller profile and refresh related seller state queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeactiva: Mutation hook that deactivates a listing and invalidates listing-related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveUser: Mutation hook to save the current user’s profile and refresh its cache.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdateLi: Mutation hook for updating a listing and refreshing associated queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Query hook to fetch the current user’s profile once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsSeller.t: Query hook that checks whether the current user is registered as a seller.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListingDet: Query hook that retrieves details for a single listing by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListings.t: Loads all listings by fetching all sellers and aggregating their listings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMyListings: Fetches listings belonging to the authenticated user based on their principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSellers.ts: Fetches a seller’s profile by principal with safe error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, loading identities, and handling login/logout flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with search, category filtering, and a grid of listings loaded from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed info for a single listing, including images, seller info, and owner actions like deactivation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user’s profile, listings, and prompts for profile setup if missing, with options to save user data.
frontend/src/pages/SellCreateListingPage: Provides a form for authenticated users to create new listings and handles submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SellEditListingPage.t: Allows owners to edit an existing listing, loading its data and submitting updates back to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, versions, and a detailed list of implemented features for the ICP marketplace app.
